com.htsmart.wristband.connector

Interface IDeviceConnector


  • public interface IDeviceConnector
    Bluetooth device connector.Used for connect with wristband. Get instance like this: 
     IDeviceConnector connector = WristbandApplication.getDeviceConnector();
    Use addConnectorListener(ConnectorListener) to monitor connect/disconnect state. And removeConnectorListener(ConnectorListener)} to remove a listener. Use connectWithLogin(BluetoothDevice, IWristbandUser) or #connectWithLogin(String, IWristbandUser) do connect and login operation. Use connectWithBind(BluetoothDevice, IWristbandUser) or #connectWithBind(String, IWristbandUser) do connect and bind operation. When connect and login/bind success,ConnectorListener.onConnect(WristbandConfig) will callback.

    Bind and login is not the same. If bind with user1, the user2 can't login, but can bind again.

    • Method Detail

      • connectWithLogin

        void connectWithLogin(BluetoothDevice device,
                    IWristbandUser user)
        Connect devices. When the connection is successful, login the device and do some basic settings for it.
        Parameters:
        device - Bluetooth device.
        user - Bind user info.

      • connectWithBind

        void connectWithBind(BluetoothDevice device,
                   IWristbandUser user)
        Connect devices. When the connection is successful, bind the device and do some basic settings for it.
        Parameters:
        device - Bluetooth device.
        user - Bind user info.

      • isConnect

        boolean isConnect()
        Whether it has been connected
        Returns:
        True for connect. False for not.

      • setTryTimeStrategy

        void setTryTimeStrategy(TryTimeStrategy strategy)
        Set retry strategy.

        When the wristband is disconnected from the passive, the time interval of this setting determines the frequency of the attempt to connect. Default setting is this: 

               private TryTimeStrategy mTryTimeStrategy = new TryTimeStrategy() {
        Parameters:
        strategy -
